archimate:Requirement.name: All business processes must be modelled using a business process model
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Must address all activities identified in value chain.
All business process models must be saved in BPMN 2.0 format.
Swimlanes in BPM should be horizontal.
Business roles used in BPM must be defined in HR system with detailed definition.
BPM must comply with all AW polices and standards
